attributes.action: Allow signing of these petitions both for or against.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It would provide a more balanced view of public opinion if the public could sign each online petition either in support of it, or in resistance to it.

Currently it is only possible to show support of a petition, or ignore it. Not signing a petition cannot be considered apposing it, so there is no direct way to appose an online petition via this website.

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
